title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6208.3 - Determination and order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6208.3 - Determination and order

State Regulations

Within 30 days after the service of such petition, the State

Board of Elections shall make its determination thereon and issue an order
accomplishing the purposes and objectives of the Reapportionment Compliance

Act. A copy of such order shall be sent by registered mail to the petitioner, to each board of elections affected by the order, to the Temporary President of
the Senate, to the Speaker of the Assembly and to the Attorney

General. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6208.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
